overview: A tragic injury cut short the dreams dedicated soldier Jace Ryan (Chad White) had for a life in the military. The challenges he faced during his recovery proved to be both physically and emotionally taxing. Enter the beautiful Annie Grant (Brett Rossi), an empathetic rehab nurse hiding deep wounds of her own behind her sweet and gentle personality. Can these two find a way to pick up the broken pieces of their lives? Can they hold on long enough eo experience true love together? Watch and see for yourself!
title: Enchanted Arms
